mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_email, user_pwd, user_name, user_phone, user_picture, user_regdate) VALUES (#{user_email}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone},#{user_picture}, now());
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_email = #{user_email}, user_pwd = #{user_pwd}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_picture = #{user_picture}, user_state_code =#{user_state_code} WHERE user_email = #{user_email};
